charinfo.name: Uchiha Shisui
charinfo.description: A member of the prestigious Uchiha clan, and the best friend of Uchiha Itachi; Shisui is a highly trained ninja that is utterly devoted to Konoha. Shisui is one of the few known ninjas capable of using one the most powerful genjutsu: Koto Amatsukami.

abilities.name: Shisui: Susanoo
abilities.description: Shisui activates his still immature Susanoo, gaining 45 destructible defense. During this time, this skill will be replaced by 'Tsukumo'. Using this skill will reset the stacks of 'Tsukumo'.

abilities.name: Body Flicker
abilities.description: For 2 turns, if a new harmful skill is used on Shisui, he will become invulnerable to all other skills for the rest of that turn and will deal 15 damage to the enemy that used the harmful skill. This skill is invisible.

abilities.name: Shisui: Koto Amatsukami
abilities.description: Shisui activates one of the most powerful genjutsu and targets one enemy. For the rest of the game, the first time that enemy uses a new skill, they will lose 1 random chakra. During this time, Shisui can use this skill for no cost to change the target of the skill to a new enemy. This skill is invisible.

abilities.name: Shisui Intercept
abilities.description: This skill makes Uchiha Shisui invulnerable for 1 turn.
